channel.title: Runserver need help
channel.description: whenever i turn on server this is what happens :( Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. config\objects.cfg: file not found. Summon.cfg: Not Found. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at Summoning.LoadMonsters(Summoning.java:190) at Summoning.<init>(Summoning.java:32) at SkillHandler.<init>(SkillHandler.java:11) at server.main(server.java:34) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4580 Client type: high memory version UserId: 82128902 purepk is signing onto server. Critical error while checking banned users! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedusers.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedusers(client.java:29787) at client.run(client.java:8634) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned ips! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedips(client.java:29808) at client.run(client.java:8635) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned users! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedusers.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedusers(client.java:29787) at client.run(client.java:8637) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned ips! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedips(client.java:29808) at client.run(client.java:8643) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) purepk: character file not found. Critical error while checking banned users! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedusers.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedusers(client.java:29787) at client.run(client.java:8651) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned ips! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedips(client.java:29808) at client.run(client.java:8651) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) purepk: moreinfo file not found. purepk: error writing file. java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\pwz.txt (The system cannot find the path spe cified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.appendToPWZ(client.java:784) at client.run(client.java:8658) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) purepk: moreinfo file not found. purepk: error writing file. Critical error while checking moderators.! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\moderators.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkmods(client.java:29829) at client.run(client.java:8730) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking administrators! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\administrators.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkadmins(client.java:29850) at client.run(client.java:8731) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking staff! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\moderators.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkmods(client.java:29829) at client.run(client.java:8733) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking administrators! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\administrators.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkadmins(client.java:29850) at client.run(client.java:8735) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking staff! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\staff.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkstaff(client.java:29871) at client.run(client.java:8737) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) can anyone tell me how to fix plz :confused:

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @ludapwnzu ludapwnzu
item.description:
@ludapwnzu wrote:

i made a new cfg file named objects but i still get the same errors

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Just make a new text document with the beginning and ending tags that config file requires and with the extension ‘.cfg’.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @ludapwnzu ludapwnzu
item.description:
@ludapwnzu wrote:

thanks i fixed the exception but what should i do withh the config/objects.cfg: file not found

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“LeScape, post:5, topic:162813”]all i saw was

at Summoning.LoadMonsters

and figured it was cfg…[/quote]

The exception is usually more important than the stack trace. However, they are both useful to know.

[quote=“ludapwnzu, post:4, topic:162813”]thx but i still got a few errors left
Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
config\objects.cfg: file not found.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Summoning
at SkillHandler.(SkillHandler.java:11)
at server.main(server.java:34)[/quote]

Apparently the source requires Summoning.class, but that class does not exist. Just go into SkilHandler.java at lind 11 and comment it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

all i saw was

at Summoning.LoadMonsters

and figured it was cfg…

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @ludapwnzu ludapwnzu
item.description:
@ludapwnzu wrote:

thx but i still got a few errors left
Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
config\objects.cfg: file not found.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Summoning
at SkillHandler.(SkillHandler.java:11)
at server.main(server.java:34)

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“LeScape, post:2, topic:162813”]nice spam (dont need to post so much of it)
error in a cfg file somewhere[/quote]

The first, no, he can post the error no matter what the length. However, it would probably be best to put in some sort of tag (quote or code) so that it can attain a scrollbar.

Also, the cfg files hold no errors. The reason this is, is because the cfg files and many more do not exist. He is getting a java.io.FileNotFoundException when his handlers are trying to load the many files of the server hierarchy. He needs to add the cfg files and others from an existing server so that it runs successfully.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver need help
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

nice spam (dont need to post so much of it)
error in a cfg file somewhere
